component.name: Pigeon Hill Range Status
component.summary: Monitor shooting range status at Pigeon Hill Missouri Conservation Area

description.p: A system tray application that monitors the status of the shooting range at Pigeon Hill Conservation Area in Missouri. The app checks the MDC website every 2 hours and displays a visual indicator showing whether the range is open or closed.

ul.li: System tray icon with visual status indicator
Please pickup after yourself at the range
Leave the range in better shape than when you got there, a little goes long way
Be respectful of all MDC representives
Obey all posted rules and regulations at the range
Respect the four fundamental rules of gun safety at all times on the range
Communicate with those who are operating along side you
